abilities.name: Rotting Presence.
abilities.description: When any creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet one or more bulezaus, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage plus 1 necrotic damage for each bulezau within 30 feet of it.

abilities.name: Standing Leap.
abilities.description: The bulezau's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed.
abilities.description: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
